languages.text: "Узрев раны, оставленные рукой единоверца, я догадалась. Но Висирь решил не предупреждать тебя, а значит, и мне не следовало. Если бы за спиной твоей строились козни, и нож нацелен был в тебя — я бы подала знак. Но Висирь не желает тебе зла, он — твой слуга. Там, где путь иных твоих подданных ясен и прям, его тропа пролегает в тенях намеков и тайн. Доверься ему, как доверяюсь я".

traits.locale_text: "Я прочла это в знаках событий. И была скована клятвой безмолвия, ибо паутина тайн сплетает путь Ткача и тишина — его священный оберег. Но знай, Домин'{name}, если бы кровавый клинок был нацелен на тебя, я бы вышла из тени и отдала бы свою несмерть за твою. Без раздумий. Без жалости. Без сожаления".

languages.text: "When I saw the wounds made by the hand of a fellow believer, I guessed. But the Vizsier chose not to warn you, and so it was not my place to do so either. If there had been a plot against you, and a knife aimed at you, I would have given you some sign. But the Vizsier means you no harm, he is your servant. Where your other subjects' threads are clear and straight, his lie in the shadows of hints and secrets. Trust him as I do."
languages.original_text: "Узрев раны, оставленные рукой единоверца, я догадалась. Но Висирь решил не предупреждать тебя, а значит, и мне не следовало. Если бы за спиной твоей строились козни, и нож нацелен был в тебя — я бы подала знак. Но Висирь не желает тебе зла, он — твой слуга. languages.text: «Cuando vi las heridas que tenía en la mano un correligionario, lo intuí. Pero, si el Visir optó por no avisarle, tampoco me correspondía hacerlo. Si se hubiera dado alguna conspiración contra usted, alguna amenaza real, le hubiese dado alguna señal, pero no es así. El Visir no pretende herirle, es su siervo. Mientras que los hilos del resto de sus súbditos son claras y directas, las suyas anidan en las sombras de los indicios y secretos. Confíe en él como lo hago yo».
languages.original_text: "When I saw the wounds made by the hand of a fellow believer, I guessed. But the Vizsier chose not to warn you, and so it was not my place to do so either. If there had been a plot against you, and a knife aimed at you, I would have given you some sign. But the Vizsier means you no harm, he is your servant. Where your other subjects' threads are clear and straight, his lie in the shadows of hints and secrets. Trust him as I do."

Si se hubiera dado alguna conspiración contra usted, alguna amenaza real, le hubiese dado alguna señal, pero no es así. El Visir no pretende herirle, es su siervo. Mientras que los hilos del resto de sus súbditos son claras y directas, las suyas anidan en las sombras de los indicios y secretos. Confíe en él como lo hago yo».

languages.text: 「仲間の信者の手によってつけられた傷を見た時、私は察した。しかし、ヴィジールはあなたに警告をしようとしなかった。つまり、私にも警告する権利はなかった。もしあなたに対する陰謀があり、あなたにナイフが向けられていたなら、私は何らかのサインを出しただろう。しかし、ヴィジールはあなたに危害を加えるつもりはない。彼はあなたのしもべであり、他の臣下たちの糸が明瞭でまっすぐなのに対し、彼の糸はヒントや秘密の影に潜んでいる。私同様、彼を信頼してください」
languages.original_text: "When I saw the wounds made by the hand of a fellow believer, I guessed. But the Vizsier chose not to warn you, and so it was not my place to do so either. If there had been a plot against you, and a knife aimed at you, I would have given you some sign. But the Vizsier means you no harm, he is your servant. Where your other subjects' threads are clear and straight, his lie in the shadows of hints and secrets. Trust him as I do."

traits.locale_text: 「仲間の信者の手によってつけられた傷を見た時、私は察した。しかし、ヴィジールはあなたに警告をしようとしなかった。つまり、私にも警告する権利はなかった。もしあなたに対する陰謀があり、あなたにナイフが向けられていたなら、私は何らかのサインを出しただろう。しかし、ヴィジールはあなたに危害を加えるつもりはない。彼はあなたのしもべであり、他の臣下たちの糸が明瞭でまっすぐなのに対し、彼の糸はヒントや秘密の影に潜んでいる。私同様、彼を信頼してください」

languages.text: “当我看到尸体上的伤口时，我就意识到那是织网者造成的伤口，于是我便猜到了真相。不过，既然宿老选择不警告你这件事情，那我也不该警告你。如果有人密谋要害你，或是在阴影中对你利刃相向，那我一定会发出警告，但宿老没有任何恶意，他是你的仆人。你其他臣民的丝线清晰而显眼，但他的丝线却潜藏在暗示与隐秘的阴影之中。只要像我一样相信他就好。”
languages.original_text: "When I saw the wounds made by the hand of a fellow believer, I guessed. But the Vizsier chose not to warn you, and so it was not my place to do so either. If there had been a plot against you, and a knife aimed at you, I would have given you some sign. But the Vizsier means you no harm, he is your servant. Where your other subjects' threads are clear and straight, his lie in the shadows of hints and secrets. Trust him as I do."

traits.locale_text: “当我看到尸体上的伤口时，我就意识到那是织网者造成的伤口，于是我便猜到了真相。不过，既然宿老选择不警告你这件事情，那我也不该警告你。如果有人密谋要害你，或是在阴影中对你利刃相向，那我一定会发出警告，但宿老没有任何恶意，他是你的仆人。你其他臣民的丝线清晰而显眼，但他的丝线却潜藏在暗示与隐秘的阴影之中。只要像我一样相信他就好。”

languages.text: "Als ich die Wunden durch die Hand eines anderen Gläubigen sah, dachte ich es mir. Aber der Wesir hatte beschlossen, Euch nicht zu warnen, also konnte auch ich es nicht tun. Wenn es eine Intrige gegen Euch gegeben und jemand ein Messer auf Euch gerichtet hätte, hätte ich Euch einen Hinweis gegeben. Aber der Wesir will Euch nichts Böses. Er ist Euer Diener. Während die Fäden Eurer anderen Untertanen klar und gerade verlaufen, sind seine in den Schatten von Hinweisen und Geheimnissen verborgen. Vertraut ihm, wie ich es tue."
languages.original_text: "When I saw the wounds made by the hand of a fellow believer, I guessed. But the Vizsier chose not to warn you, and so it was not my place to do so either. If there had been a plot against you, and a knife aimed at you, I would have given you some sign. But the Vizsier means you no harm, he is your servant. Where your other subjects' threads are clear and straight, his lie in the shadows of hints and secrets. Trust him as I do."

languages.text: « Je m'en suis doutée dès l'instant où j'ai vu que les blessures avaient été provoquées par un autre croyant. Mais si le vizir n'a pas souhaité vous avertir, il ne m'appartenait pas non plus de le faire. S'il y avait eu un complot contre vous, et si ce complot vous visait directement, je vous aurais {mf|averti|avertie}. Mais le vizir ne vous veut aucun mal. Il est votre serviteur. Là où les fils de vos autres sujets sont manifestes, les siens sont dissimulés dans les ombres des allusions et des secrets. Accordez-lui votre confiance, comme je lui accorde la mienne. »
languages.original_text: "When I saw the wounds made by the hand of a fellow believer, I guessed. But the Vizsier chose not to warn you, and so it was not my place to do so either. If there had been a plot against you, and a knife aimed at you, I would have given you some sign. But the Vizsier means you no harm, he is your servant. Where your other subjects' threads are clear and straight, his lie in the shadows of hints and secrets. Trust him as I do."

languages.text: "İnançlı kardeşlerimden birinin elleriyle açılan yaraları gördüğümde tahmin yürüttüm. Fakat Vezir, seni uyarmamayı seçti. Bu nedenle seni uyarmak benim haddime değildi. Sana karşı bir komplo kurulsaydı, bıçağın ucunda olsaydın sana bunu belli ederdim. Ancak Vezir'in niyeti zarar vermek değildi. O senin bir hizmetkârın. Tebaandaki diğerlerinin iplikleri apaçık ve dümdüz ilerlerken onunki ipuçlarıyla ve sırlarla bezenmiş gölgelerde yatar. Benim gibi sen de ona güvenmelisin."
languages.original_text: "When I saw the wounds made by the hand of a fellow believer, I guessed. But the Vizsier chose not to warn you, and so it was not my place to do so either. If there had been a plot against you, and a knife aimed at you, I would have given you some sign. But the Vizsier means you no harm, he is your servant. Where your other subjects' threads are clear and straight, his lie in the shadows of hints and secrets. Trust him as I do."
